tests.standards: Testing follows React Testing Library for frontend component tests, Playwright for E2E testing, and accessibility testing frameworks. Unit tests require 80%+ coverage for UX components. Integration tests cover UX workflow testing. E2E tests use Playwright for browser UX functionality and accessibility validation.
